1.content: Deploy the new save/load implementation to production
1.details: 1. Push all changes to GitHub repository. 2. Deploy the updated application. 3. Verify deployment is successful and accessible.

2.content: Comprehensive end-to-end testing of WOD save/load functionality
2.details: 1. Test creating a new WOD with content blocks. 2. Save the WOD and verify thumbnail appears. 3. Click thumbnail and verify saved content loads correctly. 4. Test editing existing WOD and saving updates.

3.content: Comprehensive end-to-end testing of Block save/load functionality
3.details: 1. Test creating a new Block with content. 2. Save the Block and verify thumbnail appears. 3. Click thumbnail and verify saved content loads correctly. 4. Test editing existing Block and saving updates.

4.details: 1. Document all test results and any issues found. 2. Confirm the critical save/load bug is fully resolved. 3. Provide final status report to user.
